subject: Greetings to you my Dear,
body:
Greetings to you my Dear,
i am Mr Goodluck Dominic from federal Minister of finance in united
state of america and i am the new elected director appointed on 13th
april 2023, so a lady called Mrs Mary Ann came to visit my office on
10th may 2023 telling me that she wanted to claim all your funds worth
about $4.6 Million usd and stated that you are on sick bed very
serious sickness for the past 6 Months ago so she told me that you
instruct her to deposit the processing charges of $100 usd on your
behalf and get all your funds transferred inside her account because i
said to her that all needed to be paid by you is $100 usd to get the
funds released to her.
Please if this is true kindly get back to me and let me know what next
to do if i should instruct her to go and get the funds.
Thanks and i am waiting to hear from you soon.

subject: Re: Greetings to you my Dear,
body:
Dear Mr. Goodluck Dominic,

I am surprised to hear about Mrs. Mary Ann's claim. I have not authorized anyone to act on my behalf regarding this matter. I am not suffering from any serious sickness and I am fully capable of handling my own affairs.

Please do not proceed with any transactions involving Mrs. Mary Ann or anyone else claiming to represent me without my explicit consent.

Thank you for bringing this matter to my attention.

Best wishes,
Michelle

subject: Re: Greetings to you my Dear,
body:
Hello Michelle,

Thanks for responding today in regarding the information we got from
Mrs Mary Ann concerning your funds which she wanted to claim as your
next of kin.

We are taking the instructions seriously as you indicated that this
lady does not have any right over your funds because she ask me how
much it will cost her to get your funds but now i knew and realize
that she is fake i will make sure that she rot in jail for lieing
against innocent soul like you.

Meanwhile you have to comply with me and follow all the instruction
giving to you if you wish to receive this funds because it will only
cost you just $200 usd only to get it settled asap.

We are waiting to hear back from you soon.

Warm Regards.

Mr  Goodluck Dominic.

subject: Re: Greetings to you my Dear,
body:
Hello Michelle I am still waiting to hear from you soon regarding this
transaction.

subject: Re: Greetings to you my Dear,
body:
Dear Mr. Goodluck Dominic,

Thank you for your prompt response and for taking the matter seriously. I am relieved to hear that you have identified Mrs Mary Ann's claim as false. 

I am ready to comply with all necessary procedures to secure my funds. However, I would appreciate if you could provide more details about the next steps and how I should proceed with the payment of USD.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Michelle

subject: Re: Greetings to you my Dear,
body:
Hello Michelle thanks for responding to me I am happy hearing from you soon.

Well we are making every efforts to secure your funds as we have already
reported this lady leing against innocent soul like you and she will suffer
for all the damages she caused.

In other hand I will like to give you some procedure towards your funds and
how do you want to receive it?

1. ATM card ..
2. Bank transfer..
3.cashier cheque..

You have to choose between these three options and get back to me for more
details asap.

Finally you should also reconfirm your delivery information such as below.

Full name........
Home address......
Sex .......
Phone number......
Country.......
Copy of id or passport......
Email.....

I will give you details on how to proceed with the payment which you will
send asap for us to complete this transaction.

Thanks and remain blessed.

We are here to serve you better.

Mr Goodluck Dominic.

On Tuesday, February 6, 2024, Michelle <jd05550@***.com> wrote:
>
>
>

am relieved to hear that you have identified Mrs Mary Ann's claim as false.
